## donchian() function

Computes Donchian channel, i.e. min/max values for sliding window.

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donchian\_channel](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donchian_channel)

Note: the number of results will be `period-1` less than the number of processed inputs.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function donchian(period: number): Transducer<number, [number, number]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  period | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Transducer<number, [number, number]>`
